abstract: Court of Appeals for District of Columbia Circuit upholds 25-year prison sentence for Oscar Ramiro Ortega-Hernandez, who in 2011 fired almost eight rounds from semiautomatic rifle pointed at White House.
lead_paragraph: A United States appeals court on Tuesday upheld the 25-year prison sentence of an Idaho man who fired at least eight rounds from a semiautomatic rifle at the White House in 2011.

headline.main: Lengthy Sentence Upheld for Man Who Fired at the White House
headline.print_headline: Lengthy Sentence Upheld for Man Who Fired at the White House

snippet: A United States appeals court on Tuesday upheld the 25-year prison sentence of an Idaho man who fired at least eight rounds from a semiautomatic rifle at the White House in 2011.
